name: Beyond The West
description:
<A attempt at modding.>
This mods adds 3 brand new slugcats following the style of MSC, with each their abilities and movement tech to discover and play around !
They do not have a campaign for now, although they may have one if I decide to keep working this mod.
The mod should be fully compatible wiht Meadow arena, and partially compatible with Meadow Story mode.

 A BIG thanks to the alpha testers Martyn and M'eien.
